text: aho visvasa kalavuni! numbala allahge udavkaruvan lesa sitinu. “allah veta mata udav karanno kavurun dæ?” yi maryamge put isa (tama) golabalayinta pævasuvak men. “api allahge udavkaruvo vemu” yæyi havariyvarun (gola sravakayo) pævasuha. (pasuva) israil daruvangen pirisak visvasa kala atara tavat pirisak pratiksepa kaloya. evita api visvasa kalavun va ovunge saturanta erehi va api saktimat kalemu
